text: Maga jevha te tya upadesala visarale, jyaci tyanna athavana karuna dili jata rahili, tevha amhi tya lokanna tara vacavuna ghetale je tyanna va'ita gostipasuna rokhata hote, ani tya lokanna je juluma atyacara karita hote eka sakta siksa-yatanene dharale, ya karanane ki te ajna bhanga karita hote
